website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch laundry detergent that simultaneously lifts away dirt and locks in an amazing scent.
pros: Keeps laundry smelling great even after 2 weeks
Designed for use with regular and high-efficiency washers
Includes perfume microcapsules that gradually break and release a pleasant scent while you wear your clothes
Terrific scent is sure to bring a smile to your face
cons: Bottle is small compared to other laundry detergent bottles
Scent may be too strong for some people

customer_reviews.title: Favorite detergent
customer_reviews.text: Great detergent. I had an ex who was apparently allergic and it destroyed him haha. Now I get to use it all i want bc I love the scent and the sensitive man is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected. Good value. Money well spent. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Love the original Gain scent!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Gain for years because I just love how it smells. It has always cleaned my clothes well and I have never had a problem with my clothes fading. The original scent was the first one I tried and has always been a favorite of mine. My sheets, towels and pet beds always smell great for a week until it is time to do laundry again. Very happy with this detergent and will continue to purchase whenever I can. Would recommend this scent to anyone that uses Gain, or who would like to try it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Loves Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product. I had been using a top brand, and it was excellent, but Gain was less expensive so gave it a try. I like the way the clean clothes smell, You will use less of the soap so goes farther, and of course the more affordable cost is an added benefit. I'm very happy that I gave it a try.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.M.M.

customer_reviews.title: love it!!  Use with the Gain dryer sheets and my family is loving it!
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff! I am blind so my sense of smell is very in-tune to odors and this stuff smells great! works well on the laundry, love the lingering great smell on my clothes and sheets!!
customer_reviews.author: Nellie-- a blind shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting hot white chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Tried this and loved it! I drink a cup of tea every night and bought this for a change of pace. It satisfies the chocolate craving but is lighter tasting than regular hot chocolate. It’s really very good!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent.
customer_reviews.text: We use a lot of Gain detergent in our house and I can honestly say no detergent gets our clothes cleaner or fresher.
customer_reviews.author: Gooshums

customer_reviews.title: always buy this from amazon, but watch the cost per unit in bulk purchases
customer_reviews.text: my favorite. I got it for a cheaper unit cost than Costco. very happy with the purchase. you just need to pay attention to the quantity & unit cost... not all bulk items are the same and the unit cost actually tends to get worse (from what I have seen) as the bulk size of the item goes UP... which seems a bit backwards and the opposite of what I expected... but it is true. The smaller the bulk, the cheaper the unit cost, on amazon. I noticed this a lot with paper towels, detergent/ softener & toilet paper.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Clean clothes and nice smell
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the same Landry detergent for years. This is probably my favorite brand overall. It has a good price, cleans well, and smells good. I was able to get it through prime pantry for a few dollars less than my grocery store. What I thought was nice is amazon (or maybe Gain) put the huge bottle in a plastic semi sealed bag. This way if it were to spill or something it wont get on all of your other items. Keep this one in stock amazon and I will buy more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Water Added!
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst products I’ve purchased on Amazon! I’ve used Gain detergent for years so I know how it looks, smells and works. This product was very watery, didn’t clean well and made way too much suds. Clearly they had added water. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell
customer_reviews.text: Wow, even better scent than the original. Cleans great, smells wonderful and the smell stays for days. Delivery was great two days.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Best Detergent
customer_reviews.text: One of if not the best detergent I’ve ever used. Laundry has a super clean scent that lasts even when folded in a drawer. Stains are no match. I prefer over Tide.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne S

customer_reviews.title: Gain Liquid Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of Gain, and it cleans my clothes fairly well. I have a water softener, so I don't have to use very much of the product, which makes it a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn G. Mcnelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I used another MAJOR name brand detergent. I bought Gain because of the price. Yes this is the large bottle & now my clean clothes smell great as do our linens. I'll be a repeat buyer at this price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: The new liquid detergent choice at my house.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this double pack since my first choice (another brand) seemed a bit pricey. I am glad I did. I really like this detergent. I have the HE for my washer and it makes just enough suds for what I am washing. The smell is nice and the clothes come out clean and fresh. The liquid is a nice, thick green. The lavender scented Gain is great also. My daughter bought me some of that to try. I would recommend....it is good to try new things once in a while. You may get a pleasant surprise. Wish I would have tried it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Apple scent
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Gain I bought in many years. I read reviews from various search engines on how to keep the clean smell going for awhile. All reviews agreed, Gain has the longest lasting scent. They are correct! Then, when I opened the detergent, Apple hit my nose! Because of this chance purchase on my part, this is the ONLY laundry detergent I will use, only this scent!
customer_reviews.author: rstonepal

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent ever
customer_reviews.text: Gain is the best detergent. It’s changed my life and it’s changed the lives of people I turn onto it. I’ve never had my laundry smell so incredible and feel so clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lewitinn

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I used powder detergent for a long time because it's cheaper. But I got tired of always having powder stains on my clothing after washing, so I finally switched back to liquid detergent. This makes your clothes smell good, even after a full day of wearing it. If you don't want your clothes scented, you probably won't want to use this. Clothes seem pretty clean, but I'm not sure if the detergent is too harsh or not. My clothes seem a little stiff after washing with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Y.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite detergent
customer_reviews.text: I am a Gain person all the way. My clothes are clean, not faded, and smell wonderful. My grandchildren even remark on how nice my towels smell. I doubt changing at any time.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Gain is the greatest
customer_reviews.text: I boughtthis size becauseyou did'nt have the smaller. You had Tide but not Gain. please get the smaller size again Iwould buy two ofthe smaller I am not strong to hold
customer_reviews.author: Georgina L Piloto

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Recieved these in perfect condition no leaks or anything. I was afraid they would all leak out before I recieved them, just bc most of the reviews I read said that happened. But no problems for me thankfully
customer_reviews.author: Janaya

customer_reviews.title: Clean fresh scent!
customer_reviews.text: Gain has a fresh clean scent fbzf bfings a smile to your face when you put on your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Shaw

customer_reviews.title: I like Gain.
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Tide user for almost all my life, but I've been changing to Gain. I like Gain maybe better than Tide.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Love Gain
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has great smell. My clothes always smell so good for days.

customer_reviews.title: Watered down
customer_reviews.text: This was watered down. I have been ordered gain for over a year and the consistency is very watered down. Very upsetting.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well & smells terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give more stars for the scent. It also really cleans well.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My go to laundry detergent. Was packaged great. No leaks. Love the scent

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent ever
customer_reviews.text: Great quality detergent! If there’s anything that gets white stains and brown streaks out of my underwear, it’s definitely gain!

customer_reviews.title: Smell is amazing and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Tide, and my laundry never smelled like anything really. Tried Gain and will never switch to anything else! The smell is amazing and long lasting. Dissolves well in the machine. I even bought Gain dish soap.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent item for wash the cloth. It has very nice arome and I can get my clothe very clean

customer_reviews.title: Laundry cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: Just the best smell value cleaning power. Just what we need.

customer_reviews.title: Laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: this is a very large bottle and very nice to not go to the store to get detergent.

customer_reviews.title: My Gain
customer_reviews.text: Very good value and they came right to my door. I did not have to lug them home. It's a big bonus~~~

customer_reviews.title: My favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Great laundry soap. Favorite brand for my sensitive skin. Shipped nicely with a seal sticker to prevent any leaks.

customer_reviews.title: Love Gain. Smells great

I never run out and dont have to even think about things i buy all the time such as laundry detergent, toilet paper, shampoo, dog food, cat food, etc. Too bad more items are not offered. They usually give a discount if you subscribe. I'd subscribe if there wasn't a discount just for the convenience.

customer_reviews.title: great feeling and keep my clothes smell good for almost ...

customer_reviews.title: Delayed Need

I look for larger/bulkier items to buy on line that are priced well enough to justify doing it. this one is a becoming a regular on my list.

I have been working on changing all of my products to natural and environmentally friendly products. This is one product I don't want to give up. I am hoping that Gain will come up with an all-natural alternative.

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad to dispose of this item

The smaller the bulk, the cheaper the unit cost, on amazon. I noticed this a lot with paper towels, detergent/ softener & toilet paper.

product_meta.title: Gain + Aroma Boost Liquid Laundry Detergent, Original, 64 Loads 100 fl oz
product_meta.description:
Gain Liquid Laundry Detergent in Original Scent. For more of the scent you love, try adding Gain Fireworks and Gain Fabric Softener to your wash.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :5.4 x 7.4 x 11.17 inches; 7.32 Pounds
 * Item model number :GAIN LQ 2X HEC OF 4/100Z 64LD
 * Date First Available :April 22, 2014
 * Manufacturer :P&G
 * ASIN :B00I3N3EX6

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars1,940 ratings Gain Liquid Laundry Detergent in Original Scent. For more of the scent you love, try adding Gain Fireworks and Gain Fabric Softener to your wash.
feature_bullets: Liquid laundry detergent with brilliant cleaning performance that leaves behind a refreshing Gain Original scent. Smells great because it cleans great!
7 weeks of freshness from wash until wear.

Freshness of 1 cap of Gain liquid laundry detergent = 1 bottle of the leading baking soda detergent. *In-wear freshness of 1 large dose of Gain vs. 50 oz bottle of leading baking soda detergent/ scent.
Like any household detergent, keep away from children.

Keeps fantastic freshness in your clothes even after two weeks!^Original Scent combines these sniff-tastic elements: Overtones: Orange, lemon and blossoms with a modern fruity, green twist. Undertones: White floral jasmine with a hint of woody amber.^Get the Matching Scent in Gain Liquid Fabric Softener or Gain Dryer Sheets!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
